# Data

```{r}
C7_M <- read_delim(
  "data/C7_MgMap_50.txt",
  "\t",
  escape_double = FALSE,
  col_names = FALSE,
  trim_ws = TRUE
) %>% 
  rename(x=X1,y=X2,z=X3,mg_ca=X4) %>% 
  select(-X5,-z) %>% 
  mutate(x=x/1000,
         y=y/1000)


source(here('make_trace.R'))

make_trace(C7_M,buffer=0.1)# function needs map that is has columns of x,y, mg_ca in that order
```
